price: Ishee keessa dhukkubni hin jiru; isaan ishee irraa hin machaa’anis.
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
